job_tasks.phrase: As a passionate Medior Engineer, you help with the realization of new features.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of developing and implementing new functionalities within a software product, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You contribute by keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining coding standards and security is a fundamental aspect of software engineering, ensuring the quality and integrity of the codebase.

job_tasks.phrase: And develop new features using the latest technology.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development of new features, a core software engineering task, with an emphasis on using current technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: You participate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests and manage the continuous integration of code.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence lists several key software development activities: participating in agile ceremonies, writing code, ensuring code quality, establishing best practices, writing tests, and managing CI.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop a feature-rich product for our employees, guided by a senior developer.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a product with many features, a core software engineering responsibility, even with guidance from a senior developer.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to technically scale the services in the 'employee experience platform', which empowers the "@AH app".
job_tasks.justification: Scaling services is a crucial aspect of software engineering, ensuring that applications can handle increased load and demand.

job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to combine best agile development practices in combination with a services-based architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to applying agile methodologies and working with a microservices architecture, both fundamental software engineering concepts.

job_tasks.phrase: Are knowledgeable of your domain (Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), though you can also liaise with other engineers and their respective technologies (Front and Back End).
job_tasks.justification: This highlights expertise in backend services and the ability to interact with other engineering disciplines, which are standard software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: You get to work with modern technologies, and since this is a new-build solution, we have zero legacy.
job_tasks.justification: Working with modern technologies in a new build is a characteristic of software development roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Opportunity to learn more about test automation, IT security.
job_tasks.justification: Test automation and IT security are integral parts of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Everything we build in the app is scalable, using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the use of scalable architecture, cloud services, microservices, and CI/CD pipelines, all core software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: We work in small increments so we're able to put things live straight away, hence reduce our time to market.
job_tasks.justification: Working in small increments and focusing on time-to-market are agile software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: We work in a multi-disciplinarian team; with dedicated QA, UX designer, developers, product owner.
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration within a multidisciplinary team is a common aspect of software development projects.

job_tasks.phrase: This initiative, building an employee app for your own colleagues, is a priority project for Albert Heijn, with the potential of scaling to other brands within Ahold Delhaize.
job_tasks.justification: Building an application, even for internal use, is a software development task, with considerations for scaling across brands.

job_tasks.phrase: You know your technology stack: you have experience with Kotlin and some experience with MongoDB, Azure, Docker, k8s and / or Kafka.
job_tasks.justification: This lists specific technologies and languages used in backend development, which falls under software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Know your way around with CI/CD, including test automation integrations and release engineering automation (fyi, we use Azure DevOps and Github Actions)
job_tasks.justification: Proficiency in CI/CD, test automation, and release engineering are essential software engineering practices.

soft_skills.phrase: You participate in standups and refinements
soft_skills.justification: Participation in standups and refinements indicates involvement in agile team communication and planning.

soft_skills.phrase: though you can also liaise with other engineers and their respective technologies (Front and Back End).
soft_skills.justification: The ability to liaise with other engineers signifies cross-functional communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: We work in a multi-disciplinarian team; with dedicated QA, UX designer, developers, product owner.
soft_skills.justification: Working in a multidisciplinary team requires strong collaboration and communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Opportunity to learn more about test automation, IT security.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states an opportunity for learning new technical areas.

soft_skills.phrase: You contribute by keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform.
soft_skills.justification: Taking responsibility for maintaining high standards implies a sense of ownership over the platform's quality.
While guided, the role still involves contributing to product development, implying a level of ownership for their part of the work.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as feature development, code quality, testing, CI/CD, scaling services, and working with backend technologies like Kotlin, microservices, Azure, Kubernetes, and Kafka. There is no mention of AI, Machine Learning, Generative AI, LLMs, RAG, or related specialized tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the required skills and responsibilities, which are all within the domain of traditional software engineering. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML tasks that would suggest a different profile.
